scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.test-block: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/block/*.js
scripts.test-script: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/script/script.js
scripts.test-transaction: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/transaction/*.js
scripts.test-transaction-input: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/transaction/input/*.js
scripts.test-base: npm run test-other && npm run test-crypto && npm run test-encoding && npm run test-util
scripts.test-other: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/*-spec.js
scripts.test-privatekey: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/privatekey.js
scripts.test-publickey: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/publickey.js
scripts.test-crypto: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/crypto/*.js
scripts.test-encoding: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/encoding/*.js
scripts.test-util: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec test/util/*.js
